translations.landing.compare.apiTable.note: API integration tools excel at connecting SaaS applications via webhooks and APIs. Flyto2 excels when you need to automate UI interactions with human oversight points. If your workflow involves approvals or human oversight, Flyto2 is the better choice.
translations.landing.compare.apiTable.title: Flyto2 vs API Integration Tools

translations.landing.compare.rpaTable.note: Traditional RPA platforms are designed for large-scale enterprise deployments with dedicated teams and significant budgets. Flyto2 is designed for teams that need human oversight built-in and prefer a simpler setup.
